PRODUCTSET_SEARCH_WHERE.Statement: WHERE w2_ProductSet.shop_id = @shop_id AND ( (@product_set_id_like_escaped = '' OR w2_ProductSet.product_set_id LIKE @product_set_id_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') AND (@product_set_name_like_escaped = '' OR w2_ProductSet.product_set_name LIKE '%' + @product_set_name_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') )

PRODUCTSET_SEARCH_ORDER_BY.Statement: ORDER BY CASE @sort_kbn WHEN 0 THEN w2_ProductSet.product_set_id WHEN 2 THEN w2_ProductSet.product_set_name ELSE '1' END ASC, CASE @sort_kbn WHEN 1 THEN w2_ProductSet.product_set_id WHEN 3 THEN w2_ProductSet.product_set_name ELSE '1' END DESC, -- 常に一定の結果セットを得るため、主キー（昇順）ソート w2_ProductSet.shop_id ASC, w2_ProductSet.product_set_id ASC
